title: To the people that take the Bloodlust mastery and don't buy lifesteal early
body: You literally handicapped yourself, when the enemy adc has fervor and you take bloodlust without buying an early scepter, it really puts you at a disadvantage, just take fervor if you don't wanna buy lifesteal before 25-30 minutes, trust me, it'll do you better. I can't tell you how many times I've seen people lose trades/fights because of that mastery.

replies.body: The problem is allot of players just look up builds online and never read what they actually do...
